content.description: The following question refers to the topic of two emerging superpowers.
content.question: Which of the following best explains the changed United States role in European affairs after the Second World War?

choices.label: The American desire to counter the perceived communist threat by binding Western Europe in trade systems and military alliances
The American concern over the potential revival of Nazi, fascist, and other right-wing movements
The American desire to see Western Europe grant independence to colonies that had aided in the war effort against Nazi Germany and Japan
The American fear of a postwar economic collapse and a return to the economic conditions of the Great Depression

content.answer: The American desire to counter the perceived communist threat by binding Western Europe in trade systems and military alliances

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
